descriptionHtml:
SANTA CLAUSE v0.1
Skyrim mod
by thegal

Have you been naughty in Skyrim this year?!? :)

This mod replaces the 
- IRON HELMET with a santa hat, glasses and fake beard
- One of the FUR ARMOR with a santa suit

Install files in the \"Data\" folder in Skyrim. Like this:
Data\\meshes\\armor\\..\\.
Data\\textures\\clothes\\..\\.

Have not tried it in all various races and situations yet, but I presume its not going to fit everybody...

Have fun and merry Skyrim!

Changelog:
Version 0.1
First release! :)

Known Bugs:
The texture is abit stretched in places.. Will be fixed later.
author: thegal
